insert into planocycle.shelf_pts_data_tanamst (company_cd, pts_cd, tai_cd, tana_cd, tana_height, tana_width, tana_depth, tana_thickness, tana_type, create_time, author_cd) values

mapper.select: select tai_cd,count(tana_cd) tana_count,0 as tana_used_count from planocycle.shelf_pts_data_tanamst t1 inner join planocycle.shelf_pts_data t2 on t1.pts_cd=t2.id where t2.shelf_pattern_cd =#{shelfPatternCd} group by tai_cd order by tai_cd

select t1.company_cd, t1.pts_cd, t1.tai_cd, t1.tana_cd, t1.tana_height, t1.tana_width, t1.tana_depth, t1.tana_thickness, t1.tana_type, t1.create_time, t1.author_cd, t1.edit_time, t1.editer_cd, t1.deleteflg from planocycle.shelf_pts_data_tanamst t1 inner join planocycle.shelf_pts_data t2 on t1.pts_cd=t2.id where t1.deleteflg=0 and t2.shelf_pattern_cd =#{shelfPatternCd}
